thread.title: Man-Cave | Zoo magazine has shut down, but their final cover was brilliant
thread.title_full: Man-Cave | Zoo magazine has shut down, but their final cover was brilliant - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Man-Cave | Zoo magazine has shut down, but their final cover was brilliant
text:
There's a lot that you can say against Australian lads mag, Zoo.
Over the years it's been labelled sexist, demeaning towards women, catering only for the low-brow common denominator, and a bunch of other things that there's no point in listing off.
While we can't say we read it (that often), can it really been have been that!? Genuinely, we have no idea. We don't live in Australia.
But they did sometimes have a sense of humour, and they kept that up right until the end of their last edition. Here's the final ever cover of the magazine.
Well played.
Via Mashable
